Character.name: Konia
intro: Konia: You look lost, little one.
Konia: You have found many treasures. And in finding them, you think you have found yourself.
Konia: But you must ask yourself... what have you lost along the way?
Konia: Ask yourself this question... as you face me.

attacks.name: Purpose
dialog: Konia's expression is calm, but hides deep meaning.
Konia: Ask yourself: What is it that I truly do?
The question hits you kind of hard.

attacks.name: Identity
dialog: Konia's expression is serene, but glimmers with deep strength.
Konia: Ask yourself: Who is it that speaks within me?
The question makes you think a lot about yourself.

attacks.name: Strength
dialog: Konia's expression is stern, but is colored a glint of kindness.
Konia: Ask yourself: How heavy must I grow before I am crushed?
The question weighs heavy on your mind.

attacks.name: Peace
dialog: Konia's expression is tranquil, but seems to hold deep strength.
Konia: Ask yourself: How can I face my future with peace in my heart?
The question makes you feel anything but peaceful.

conversations.prompt: Konia: Ask yourself: Who was I, when my journey began?

followup: Konia raises only an eyebrow in reply...
Then he goes back to being all enigmatic.

conversations.prompt: Konia: Ask yourself: What have I accomplished, along my path?

replies.text: I've seen the strength in others.
followup: But then he just gets all quiet again.

conversations.prompt: Konia: Ask yourself: What will I be, when my days are done?

followup: But, naturally, he doesn't bother to say anything.

conversations.prompt: Konia: Ask yourself: Where will I finally be free?

replies.text: Playing the games I always loved.
followup: ...which is pretty cool, because it's basically the most he's moved like this entire time.
You feel... pretty good all of a sudden.

replies: You blast your kickin' sound system for Konia, confident that he'll appreciate your sweet new sound.
...but if he even noticed, he sure didn't show it.
You put on your fiercest, highest-resolution face for Konia, sure to put your best face(s) forward.
...but he didn't bother to look up to see it.
You take a selfie with Konia, sure that you can dazzle him with this fancy new feature of yours.
...but he didn't bother to open his eyes, which you discover is a lot like blinking in terms of ruining a photo.
You print out a fancy diagram of your sweet new body for Konia, hoping to impress him with the technical specs.
...but he doesn't bother to look at the page.
You search for Konia on the internet, trying to impress him with pictures and info about himself.
...but it's just a bunch of pictures of phones breaking things?  He doesn't seem to care.

win: Konia finally looks up, and seems to acknowledge you for the first time.
Konia: You have traveled far, and worked hard to progress to this moment.
Konia: But you must understand that this was a journey not of acquisition, but of discovery.
Konia: You have discovered many objects, and many abilities, yes.
Konia: But these are not the discoveries that matter.
Konia points from object to object on your new body.
Konia: These things...? These are just things.
Konia: Focus instead on the moments that gave them to you.  The people that gave them to you.
Konia: You wear many new technologies, but you need none of them.
Konia: The things that make you who you are were there with you all along.
Konia: They are your strength, your purpose, and your identity...
Konia: ...but they must also become your peace.
Konia: Take it from this old phone, my friend...
Konia: History will remember you for what you truly are, and what strengths you truly had.
Konia: It was not my place to show you the path. But I am glad you have found it on your own.
Konia: Shed this false shell that you wear, and let it unburden you at last.
Konia smiles, and closes his eyes once more.  He gets all quiet again, like he does.
lose: Konia closes his eyes and goes back to being his silent self.
It leaves a little to be desired as far as victory dances go, but at least he's not all smug about it.
Just then, he glances up, as if expecting something.
Maybe he's looking for a rematch?
